amendment.description: Amendment strikes sec. 8055 which prohibits the Department of Defense from modifying the command and control relationships between U.S. Fleet Forces Command and the U.S. Pacific Fleet.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 14 printed in House Report 114-623 to strike Sec. 8055, which prohibits the Department from modifying the command and control relationships between U.S. Fleet Forces Command and the U.S. Pacific Fleet.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Wittman amendment (A014) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A014) offered by Mr. Wittman.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Wittman amendment (A014) Agreed to by voice vote.
